extendedInfo.description: Now you can manage your money anytime, anywhere â from your mobile device. With Clear Mountain Mobile you can conveniently and securely:â¢Check your account balancesâ¢View recent transactionsâ¢Transfer money between your accountsâ¢Pay billsâ¢Find Clear Mountain Bank ATMs and branch locationsFor more information, visit www.clearmountainbank.com/mobile.Keywords: Clear, Mountain, Bank, Mobile, Banking

reviews.title: Works only some of the time
reviews.comment: App only works half of the time if that always gives a system error or can\'t view at this time message, really getting tired of this bank app worst I have ever had.
reviews.author: rebecca younkin

reviews.title: Not able to pay bills
reviews.comment: This app claims that there is a capability to pay bills, but I can only see my balance and transactions. The app is so limited that it could drive me to change banks.
reviews.author: Susie Spiker

reviews.title: love it!
reviews.comment: easy to use glad it was made
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The wait is over!!!
reviews.comment: Thank you CMB.  I\'ve been waiting a long time for this app!  Works great!  Quick and easy setup. Log on once and you have no doubt your information is safe, secure and best yet, easy to access on the go!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: I waited forever for this to come out. Nice job guys. Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this. Thet needed it for a while.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I have been waiting app for some time and it is wonderful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fine
reviews.comment: Just installed app, but I don\'t have much faith in it. I hate CMB and cannot wait to switch. It is like banking in the dark. Was not notified when changes were made to my account that cost me $, or when my debit card was HOT CARDED, and ATM\'s seem incapable of telling you correct balance. Will tell you there\'s $600 more than there truly is. Switching to BB&T soon and ending this abusive relationship.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use with a simple and clean UI. Not surprised at the quality of this app as Clear Mountain Bank is a first class financial institution.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for checking your balance and statementsbon the go
reviews.comment: Very fast and easy to find what you need, great app!
reviews.author: Chase Thomas

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is the best app you can instal if your a coustomer. I am so glad its arrived!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
